article.title: SAIC Provides Weapons of Mass Destruction Defeat Technology
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation, San Diego, California, was awarded a $23 million task order under the Weapons of Mass Destruction (WMD) defeat technology contract for phase three of the Integrated WMD Toolset (IWMDT). The contractor will provide the development and integration architecture framework to support the Defense Threat Reduction Agency technology transfer, gateway and portal use. In addition, the contractor will support the development, maintenance, and update responsibilities as needed for common software and support documentation to efficiently facilitate tool developer participation and integration into the IWMDT. The Defense Threat Reduction Agency, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
